content: **crocheted star coaster in drops paris theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-852 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 11 cm **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 17 off white 1 star weighs approx 14 g crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 17 treble crochets in width and 10 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
